title: r/AmITheA**hole For Quitting When My Boss Refused To Let Me Leave?
description: r/AmITheA**hole In today's story, OP's boss refused to let her quit. She handed in her resignation, but the boss was like, "Nope, I don't accept it. Guess you have to keep working here, LOL!" There's only one little problem with that: forcing people to work against their will is literally slavery, so OP called him on his BS and just walked out. Does that make OP the butthole? If you like this video, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
